data.title: Four Presidents Together
data.meta_description: Four Presidents Together. President Reagan met with three other Presidents on October 8, 1981 prior to the funeral for Egyptian President Anwar Sadat. Click on Thumbnails below for larger imagesÂ which are all available in higher resolution.
data.text:
President Reagan met with three other Presidents on October 8, 1981 prior to the funeral for Egyptian President Anwar Sadat. Click on Thumbnails below for larger images which are all available in higher resolution. You can download higher resolution images (400 dpi JPG, 4-5MB) of most of these photos from the National Archives Catalog. For use of Reagan Library audiovisual materials please read the AV disclaimer.

Order Form

Order Information and Pricing

Main White House Photograph Collection Galleries Page

C4360-18A, Four Presidents (Reagan, Carter, Ford, Nixon) pose for a portrait prior to leaving for Egypt and President Anwar Sadat's Funeral. 10/08/1981.

C4367-4, Four Presidents (Reagan, Carter, Ford, Nixon) toasting in the White House Blue Room prior to leaving for Egypt and President Anwar Sadat's Funeral. 10/08/1981.

C4367-25, Four Presidents in the White House Blue Room prior to leaving for Egypt and President Anwar Sadat's Funeral. 10/08/1981.

C4384-8A, Four Presidents pose for a portrait prior to leaving for Egypt and President Anwar Sadat's Funeral. 10/08/1981.

C4361-12A, President Reagan's Remarks at the Diplomatic Entrance prior to the three former Presidents Nixon, Ford and Carter leaving for Egypt and President Anwar Sadat's Funeral. 10/08/1981.
